imus fires off four of his rockets at the wall and more specificly the door=
. He then ducks behind the desk. The rockets should have no problem blowing=
 most of the damaged wall back.

nd the sweep that followed him leaped foward giving pusuit.

Scourge stepped onto the b=
ridge as the sweep flanked him, and they 
fanned out, searching for the sur=
prisingly elusive Rodimus. As 
soundlessly as posible they brush aside debr=
is and fallen items until 
they come to the door of the ready room. From in=
side they can hear a 
discussion . . . 

> Rodimus: Reprogram her. Bolster =
our forces. We need it. Use and

A dark chuckling=
 came from the other side of the door as it 
evaporated seemingly into thin=
 air. On the other side Scourge and the 
other sweep that was with him stoo=
d, weapons drawn, obviously the

=
"Be careful indeed Cybertronian! "

Scourge hit a button on his chest, the =
all call button, one that 
would call the other few sweeps on the ship to c=
onverge on thier 
position from where ever they are on the ship.

l be a prize for Cyclonus" Scourge chuckled darkly as he
